id.description: The ID of the deal-product (the ID of the Product attached to the Deal)

duration_unit.description: The type of the duration. (For example hourly, daily, etc.)

sum_no_discount.description: The Product sum without the discount

sum.description: The sum of all the Products attached to the Deal

currency.description: The currency associated with the Deal Product

add_time.description: The date and time when the Product was added to the Deal

last_edit.description: The date and time when the Deal Product was last edited

active_flag.description: Boolean indicates if the Product is activated or not
